short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Receive updates letting you know when Mizkif goes live or changes games.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mizkif Updates allows you to receive up to date information about Mizkif. The extension will allow you to see if he is live, what category he is in, the latest tweet, and receive notifications any time Mizkif goes live or changes categories on Twitch.
